targets.query:
import "date"

minus3m = date.sub(d: 3m, from:v.timeRangeStop)

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start:minus3m , stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "page" and r._field =="duration" ) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 

data 
|> window(every: 1m, createEmpty:true ) 
|> count()
|> group()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"])

data 
|> window(every: 1m, createEmpty:true ) 
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling} }))
|> window(every: $__interval, timeColumn:"_stop")
|> max()
|> toFloat()
|> group()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with hitPerSecond:r._value/60.0 }))
|> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "hitPerMinutes")
|> keep(columns: ["_start", "hitPerSecond", "hitPerMinutes"])

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and (
  (r._field =="sessionAge" and r._value==0 and r.name != "/reservation/demarche/{demId}" and r.name != "/reservation/demarche/{demId}/cgu") 
  or (r._field == "sessionAgeD" and r.sessionNew=="true"))
  )
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.name =~ /\/${pageModule}.*/)
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 

data 
|> window(every: 30m, createEmpty:true)
|> count(column:"_value")
|> window(every: $__interval, timeColumn:"_stop")
|> sum()
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with countSession:(if exists r.sessionAge then r.sessionAge else 0) + (if exists r.sessionAgeD then r.sessionAgeD else 0)}) )
|> keep(columns: ["_start", "countSession"])

import "date"

minus1m = date.sub(d: 1m, from:v.timeRangeStop)

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: minus1m , stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 

data 
|> window(every: 1s, createEmpty:true ) 
|> count()
|> group()

import "strings"

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "page" )
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field =="duration" ) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true ) 

dataNil = data 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"0.duration:total" }))

data0 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value < 10)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"1.duration:count<10" }))

data1 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 10 and r._value <= 20)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"2.duration:count_20"})) 

data2 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 20 and r._value <= 50)) 
|> count()  
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"3.duration:count_50"}) ) 

data3 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 50 and r._value <= 100)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"4.duration:count_100"}) ) 

data4 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 100 and r._value <= 200)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"5.duration:count_200"}) ) 

data5 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 200 and r._value <= 500)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"6.duration:count_500"})) 

data6 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 500 and r._value <= 1000)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"7.duration:count_1000"}) ) 

data7 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 1000 and r._value <= 2000)) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, _value:r._value, _field:"8.duration:count_2000"}) ) 

data8 = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 2000) ) 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start,  _value:r._value, _field:"9.duration:count>2000"})) 

union(tables :[dataNil, data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7, data8])
|> group()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value:r._value*${sampling}})) 
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "page" )
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="duration" ) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true ) 

dataNil = data 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with le:10000000000000.0, _value:r._value*${sampling}})) 
|> toFloat()

data0 = data
|> toFloat()
|> histogram(bins: [-1.0, 10.0, 20.0, 50.0, 100.0, 200.0, 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 100000000000.0])
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value:r._value*${sampling}.0})) 
//|> group(columns: ["_field"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)

 
 union(tables :[dataNil, data0])
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["le"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

panels.title: Pages' hits clustered by response time

targets.query:
countData = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value", "errorCode"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true ) 

countError = countData
|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.errorCode)
|> drop(columns: ["errorCode"])
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))  
|> group()
|> set(key: "_field", value: "countError")

countTotal = countData
|> drop(columns: ["errorCode"])
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}})) 
|> group()
|> set(key: "_field", value: "count")

union(tables :[countError, countTotal]) 
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with errorRatio:if(exists r.countError) then float(v: r.countError)*100.0/float(v:r.count) else 0.0}) ) 
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true ) 
quantile__q_0_7Data = data 
|> quantile(q: 0.7) 
|> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") 
|> group() 
|> set(key: "alias", value:"quantile__q_0_7" ) 

medianData = data 
|> median() 
|> toFloat()
|> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") 
|> group() 
|> set(key: "alias", value:"median" ) 

quantile__q_0_9Data = data 
|> quantile(q: 0.9) 
|> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") 
|> group() 
|> set(key: "alias", value:"quantile__q_0_9" ) 

union(tables:[quantile__q_0_7Data, medianData, quantile__q_0_9Data]) 
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field", "alias"], valueColumn: "_value") 
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"]) 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with duration_median: if exists r.duration_median then r.duration_median else 0.0, duration_quantile__q_0_7: if exists r.duration_quantile__q_0_7 then r.duration_quantile__q_0_7 else 0.0, duration_quantile__q_0_9: if exists r.duration_quantile__q_0_9 then r.duration_quantile__q_0_9 else 0.0}))
|> rename(columns: {duration_median: "duration:median", duration_quantile__q_0_7: "duration:quantile__q_0.7", duration_quantile__q_0_9: "duration:quantile__q_0.9"}) 
|> yield()

import "strings"

dataError = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "webservices"
 and (r._field =="duration" ) and (r.name == "/Post//csp-report/")
 and ("${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}") 
)
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true ) 

countData = dataError 
|> count()
|> group()
|> rename(columns: {_value: "cspError"}) 
|> yield()

import "strings"
import "math"

dataBots = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> filter(fn : (r) => r.name == "/reservation/demarche/{demId}/creneau//_semaineSuivante" or r.name == "/reservation/demarche/{demId}/_validerCaptcha" )
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "name", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: duration(v: int(v: math.mMax(x: float(v:int(v:15m)) , y: float(v:int(v:$__interval))))), createEmpty:true ) 
|> count()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["name"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> group()
|> rename(columns: {"/reservation/demarche/{demId}/creneau//_semaineSuivante": "semaineSuivante"})
|> rename(columns: {"/reservation/demarche/{demId}/_validerCaptcha": "validerCaptcha"})
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, semaineSuivante:(float(v:r.semaineSuivante)), validerCaptcha:(float(v:r.validerCaptcha)), ratioCaptcha:(if(r.validerCaptcha>0 ) then float(v:r.semaineSuivante)/float(v:r.validerCaptcha) else float(v:r.semaineSuivante))}))
|> yield()

import "strings"

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  and r._field =="duration" )
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.name =~ /\/${pageModule}.*/)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "name"]) 

data 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> group(columns:["_time"]) 
|> sort(desc: true)
|> rename(columns: { "_value": "count"}) 
|> top(n:50, columns:["count"])

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn : (r) => (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="redis_duration" ) or (r._field =="search_duration" ) or (r._field =="inner_duration" ) or (r._field =="piste_duration" ) or (r._field =="publipostage_duration" )) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"])
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true )

sumData = data 
|> sum()

countData = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="inner_duration" )
|> count()
|> set(key: "_field", value: "count")

union(tables:[sumData, countData])
|> group() 
|> toFloat()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, 
sql_duration: if exists r.sql_duration then r.sql_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
search_duration: if exists r.search_duration then r.search_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
redis_duration: if exists r.redis_duration then r.redis_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
piste_duration: if exists r.piste_duration then r.piste_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
publipostage_duration: if exists r.publipostage_duration then r.publipostage_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
inner_duration: if exists r.inner_duration then r.inner_duration/r.count else 0.0}))
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn : (r) => (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="redis_duration" ) or (r._field =="search_duration" ) or (r._field =="inner_duration" ) or (r._field =="piste_duration" ) or (r._field =="publipostage_duration" )) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value"])
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true )

data 
|> sum()
|> toFloat() 
|> group() 
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time:r._start, 
sql_duration: if exists r.sql_duration then r.sql_duration else 0.0, 
search_duration: if exists r.search_duration then r.search_duration else 0.0, 
redis_duration: if exists r.redis_duration then r.redis_duration else 0.0, 
piste_duration: if exists r.piste_duration then r.piste_duration else 0.0, 
publipostage_duration: if exists r.publipostage_duration then r.publipostage_duration else 0.0, 
inner_duration: if exists r.inner_duration then r.inner_duration else 0.0}))
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn : (r) => r._field =="errorRequestUri" and r.errorCode == "404") 
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.name =~ /\/${pageModule}.*/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.exception )
|> toString()
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "errorCode"  ])
|> rename(columns: {_value:"errorRequestUri", errorCode:"_value" })
|> group(columns:["errorRequestUri"])


data 
|> count()
|> group()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn : (r) => r._field =="duration" or r._field =="errorDetailSecure" or r._field =="errorRequestUri" ) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.exception )
|> toString()
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "errorCode", "errorMsg"  ]) 
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> rename(columns: {duration:"_value"})
//|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:0 }))
|> group(columns: ["errorDetailSecure", "errorRequestUri", "errorCode", "errorMsg"  ])


data 
|> count() 
|> group()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with errorCode: if (exists r.errorCode and exists r.errorMsg) then int(v:r.errorCode) else if (exists r.errorCode and not exists r.errorMsg) then 422 else 200, errorMsg: if (exists r.errorMsg) then r.errorMsg+" : "+r.errorDetailSecure else if exists r.errorCode then "Erreur utilisateur" else "OK" }))
//|> pivot(rowKey: ["errorDetailSecure"], columnKey: ["errorMsg"], valueColumn: "errorCode")
|> drop(columns: ["errorDetailSecure"]) 
|> rename(columns: {_value: "error:count"})

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "webservices"  )
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="violated-directive" ) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> group(columns: ["_value" ])
|> count(column:"name" )
|> group()
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field =="duration" ) or (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="redis_duration" ) or (r._field =="search_duration" )or (r._field =="publipostage_duration" ) or (r._field =="piste_duration" ) or (r._field =="inner_duration" ) ) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "name", "_value"]) 

meanData = data 
|> mean() 

callCount = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="duration" )
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> toFloat()
|> set(key: "_field", value: "count")

union(tables:[meanData, callCount]) 
|> group() 
|> pivot(rowKey: ["name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._field =="duration" ) or (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="redis_duration" ) or (r._field =="search_duration" )or (r._field =="publipostage_duration" ) or (r._field =="piste_duration" ) or (r._field =="inner_duration" ) ) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.name =~ /\/${pageModule}.*/)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "name", "_value"]) 

meanData = data 
|> sum() 

callCount = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="duration" )
|> count()
|> set(key: "_field", value: "count")

union(tables:[meanData, callCount]) 
|> group() 
|> toFloat()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time:r._start, 
duration: if exists r.duration then r.duration/r.count else 0.0, 
sql_duration: if exists r.sql_duration then r.sql_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
search_duration: if exists r.search_duration then r.search_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
redis_duration: if exists r.redis_duration then r.redis_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
piste_duration: if exists r.piste_duration then r.piste_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
publipostage_duration: if exists r.publipostage_duration then r.publipostage_duration/r.count else 0.0, 
inner_duration: if exists r.inner_duration then r.inner_duration/r.count else 0.0}))
|> yield()

import "strings"

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page" )
|> filter(fn : (r) => r._field =="duration" ) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "name"]) 

count_duration = data
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "count_duration") 
  |> group()

sum_duration = data
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "sum_duration") 
  |> group()

min_duration = data
  |> min()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "min_duration") 
  |> group()

max_duration = data
  |> max()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "max_duration") 
  |> group()

union(tables: [count_duration, sum_duration, min_duration,  max_duration]) 
|> pivot(rowKey:["name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with mean_duration:r.sum_duration / r.count_duration  }) ) 
|> top(n: 20, columns:["mean_duration"])

import "strings"

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._measurement == "page"  )
|> filter(fn : (r) => (r._field =="duration") or (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="sql_count" ) ) 
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_field", "_value", "name"]) 

maxData = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field=="sql_count") 
|> max() 
|> toFloat()
|> set(key: "alias", value:"max" ) 

countSumData = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field=="sql_count") 
|> sum() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> toFloat()
|> set(key: "alias", value:"sum" ) 

countData = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field=="duration") 
|> count() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> toFloat()
|> set(key: "alias", value:"count" ) 


sumData = data 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field=="sql_duration") 
|> sum() 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> toFloat()
|> set(key: "alias", value:"sum" ) 

union(tables:[maxData, countSumData, countData, sumData]) 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with name: if exists r.name then r.name else ""}))
|> pivot(rowKey:["name"], columnKey: ["_field", "alias"], valueColumn: "_value") 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.sql_count_max>0) 
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with sql_count_mean: if exists r.sql_count_sum then r.sql_count_sum / r.duration_count else 0.0, sql_count_max: if exists r.sql_count_max then r.sql_count_max else 0.0, sql_duration_sum: if exists r.sql_duration_sum then r.sql_duration_sum else 0.0}))
|> group() 
|> rename(columns: {sql_count_mean: "sql_count:mean", sql_count_max: "sql_count:max", sql_duration_sum: "sql_duration:sum"}) 
|> yield()

|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "daemon" and ((r._field =="duration" ) ) 
 and ("${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "name", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:false ) 

data
|> max()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["name"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> group()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => 
r._measurement == "daemon" 
 and ((r._field =="duration" ) or (r._field =="sql_duration" ) or (r._field =="success" )) 
 and ("${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "name", "_value"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:false ) 

data
|> max()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["name"], valueColumn: "duration")
|> group()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (
  (r._field =="sessionAgeD" or (r._field =="sessionHitDelayD" and r.requestMethod=="POST") or (r._field =="ctxAgeD" and r.requestMethod=="POST") )
))
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
|> window(every: 1y, createEmpty:false )

data0 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value < 1 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<1s"})) 

data1 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 1 and r._value < 2 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<2s"})) 

data2 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 2 and r._value < 5 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<5s"}))

data3 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 5 and r._value < 10 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<10s"}))

data4 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 10 and r._value < 20 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<20s"}))

data5 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 20 and r._value < 60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<1m"}))

data6 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 60 and r._value < 2*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<2m"}))

data7 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 2*60 and r._value < 5*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<5m"}))

data8 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 5*60 and  r._value < 10*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<10m"}))

data9 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 10*60 and r._value < 20*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<20m"}))

data10 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 20*60 and r._value < 60*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"<1h"}))

data11 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => ( r._value >= 60*60 ))
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:">1h"}))

union(tables :[data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7, data8, data9, data10, data11]) 
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start","_field"], columnKey: ["alias"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (
  (r._field =="sessionAgeD" or (r._field =="sessionHitDelayD" and r.requestMethod=="POST") or r._field =="ctxAgeD" ) 
))
|> sample(n:${sampling})
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageName}"=="all" or r.name == "${pageName}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => "${pageModule}"=="all" or r.pathPrefix == "${pageModule}")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
|> window(every: 1y, createEmpty:false )
|> histogram(bins: [-1.0, 0.1, 1.0, 5.0, 10.0, 30.0, 60.0, 300.0, 600.0, 1800.0, 3600.0, 10000000000.0])
//|> group()
|> group(columns: ["_field"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:r._value*float(v:${sampling})}))
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start","_field"], columnKey: ["le"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

targets.query:
data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "page" and r.requestMethod=="POST" and r._field =="xForwardedFor"
                      and ("${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}"))
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:
  if(r._value== "37.169.143.2x" or r._value== "37.65.157.3x"  or r._value== "37.19.217.19x"
or r._value=="45.80.11.12x"
or r._value== "77.198.152.5x"
or r._value== "80.215.253.7x"
or r._value=="81.65.146.11x" or r._value=="81.65.151.14x" or r._value=="81.65.151.4x" or r._value=="81.65.148.21x"
or r._value=="84.17.43.4x" or r._value=="84.17.60.11x" or r._value=="84.17.60.12x"
or r._value=="88.142.51.3x" or r._value=="88.165.220.21x"
or r._value=="89.157.2.x" or r._value=="89.95.32.8x" or r._value=="89.157.4.16x"
or r._value=="90.127.33.12x" 
or r._value=="91.165.145.3x"   or r._value=="91.165.69.9x" or r._value=="91.175.244.1x" or r._value=="91.170.77.11x" 
or r._value=="92.184.99.14x" or r._value=="92.184.97.20x" or r._value=="92.151.61.3x"
or r._value=="109.13.17.12x" or r._value=="109.30.172.2x"
or r._value=="138.199.26.8x"
or r._value=="143.196.250.13x"  
or r._value=="151.106.8.3x" or r._value=="151.106.8.4x"
or r._value=="176.187.139.9x" or r._value=="176.136.227.5x" or r._value=="176.191.58.2x" or r._value=="176.158.165.12x" or r._value=="176.186.116.22x"
or r._value=="185.24.186.8x"
or r._value=="191.101.31.19x" or r._value=="191.101.31.17x" or r._value=="191.101.31.20x" or r._value=="191.101.31.9x"
or r._value=="194.250.98.24x"
or r._value=="212.195.71.20x") 
  then r._value else "autre", _time:r._time}))
|> duplicate(column: "_value", as:"xForwardedFor")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "xForwardedFor"]) 
|> window(every: $__interval, createEmpty:true )

data
|> group(columns:["_start","_stop", "xForwardedFor"])
|> count()
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_start","_stop"], columnKey: ["xForwardedFor"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "page" and r._field == "xForwardedFor" and exists r.etatReservation))  
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_time", "_value", "etatReservation"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with xForwardedFor: r._value}))
  |> group(columns: ["xForwardedFor","etatReservation"])
  |> count()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["xForwardedFor"], columnKey: ["etatReservation"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> group()
  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.confirmerReservation>2))
|> yield()

data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "page" and r._field == "xForwardedFor" and exists r.reservationMailDomain))  
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_time", "_value", "reservationMailDomain"])

targets.query:
data = from(bucket:"${app}") 
  //|> range(start: -7d, stop:now())
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "page" and r.requestMethod=="POST"))
  //|> filter(fn: (r) => "${location}"=="all" or r.location == "${location}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.pathPrefix == "reservation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "xForwardedFor" or r._field=="sessionHitDelayD")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_time", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.xForwardedFor)
  |> rename(columns: {sessionHitDelayD:"_value"})
  |> sample(n:${sampling})
  |> group(columns: ["xForwardedFor"])
  
data0 = data
|> count()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value:r._value*${sampling}}))
|> toFloat()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"count"}))

data1 = data
|> max()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"maxHitDelay"})) 

data2 = data
//=|> filter(fn: (r) => (r._value > 0 ) )
|> median()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"medianHitDelay"})) 

data3 = data
|> window(every: 1d, createEmpty:false )
|> count()
|> group(columns:["xForwardedFor"])
|> count()
|> toFloat()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"countDays"}))

data5 = data
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) 
|> window(every: 1h, createEmpty:false )
|> count()
|> group(columns:["xForwardedFor"])
|> count()
|> toFloat()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"countHoursInRange"}))


data4 = data
//|> stddev()
|> quantile(q: 0.70)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"q70HitDelay"})) 

data6 = data
//|> stddev()
|> quantile(q: 0.30)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with alias:"q30HitDelay"})) 


union(tables :[data0, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6]) 
|> group()
|> pivot(rowKey: ["xForwardedFor"], columnKey: ["alias"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ecartQuantilHitDelay:(r.q70HitDelay-r.q30HitDelay)}))
|> drop(columns: ["q70HitDelay", "q30HitDelay"])
|> filter(fn: (r) => (r.count >= 1000 ) )
|> yield()

renameByName.ageReservationAU: Dure de conservation du RDV avant annulation

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues( 
 bucket: "${app}",
 predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "page",
 tag: "name",
 start: v.timeRangeStart, 
 stop: v.timeRangeStop
)
|> filter(fn: (r) => ("${pageModule}"=="all" or r._value =~ /^\/${pageModule}.*/ ) )
